text: Confluent HAP1, H1-DV33, and H1-DV33-fV33 cells and their stably mCeacam1a expressing counterparts were detached using a cell scraper, homogenized, and fixed. After 30 min incubation in blocking buffer (3% BSA (Sigma), in PBS) for 1 h cells were incubated in 1:100 N-CEACAM-Fc [80] antibody, washed, and stained with 2ry AF488 goat-anti-rabbit antibody (Life Technologies). After washing cells were analyzed by FACS at 10,000 gated single cells per sample.
